summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Sections 3.19, 14A.7, 15.3, 16.3, 17.3 and 19.21 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to define "Fast Food Restaurant"; listing fast food restaurants as principal conditional uses in the BC, BM, and CM Zones; and listing fast food and drive-in restaurants as principal uses in the M zone.
